name: create-flutter-app
description: Template of a simple flutter app with riverpod

scripts.coverage: flutter test --coverage && genhtml coverage/lcov.info -o coverage/html && firefox coverage/html/index.html
scripts.format:check: dart format -l 80 -o write ./lib/core/languages ./lib/environments && flutter format -l 80 -o none --set-exit-if-changed ./lib ./test
scripts.generate: flutter clean && flutter packages pub get && flutter packages pub run build_runner build --delete-conflicting-outputs
scripts.lang: flutter pub run easy_localization:generate --source-dir ./assets/languages -O lib/core/languages && flutter pub run easy_localization:generate --source-dir ./assets/languages -O lib/core/languages -o locale_keys.g.dart -f keys
scripts.build: npm run config && flutter pub get && npm run lang
